replies.body: Question: Why didnt Riot keep this map as the ARAM map? i thought it was really cool and different

I have an idea
What if they made the aram map random
so it could be either howling abyss or bilgewater
yeah... i don't get why they bothered to do all this stuff to throw it into a bin after a month :/ I'd rather get another new champ or new skins tbh
pretty sure the maps will wash up again ot different tidal events
wow theses are some fine artist

because the fregord map is better..and i was forever missing ez,jinx,and ash ult because of the different layout...yes this is also because im a terible player,but that beside it was supost to be a acctivity not a permanent layout..who knows riot might bring it back(like URF LOVE IT!!!!)...ALSO plz correct all the mistakes on this...its like a mine of spelling mistakes, so have fun :P
Terrible, suppose, activity, and many more
They should have two ARAM skins, 1:Normal Freljord 2:Bildgewater and you can choose which one or you can buy it in the shop maybe

Man, when I play ARAM it's 'cuz I want to hop into a quick, fun game. I don't want the longer queue times that come with 2 different queues. As 'LadyLuxanna' suggested, I would prefer it to randomly select the map. :){{item:1076}}
they should add an extra tower to the map or a large minion like baron/dragon
Imagine a bilgewater {{champion:8}} or a bilgewater {{champion:62}} or perhaps even a bilgewater {{champion:103}} cause that'll be strange but awesome at the same time
Bilgewater jax confirmed oar for light pole :D{{champion:24}}
